Banner.Description: I have +10 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and Laravel, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In +10 years of experience I have covered many roles: Systems Analyst, Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, and Technical Lead. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer In Java
Description: Leading a team of 2 people in the development of a attendance and leave modules.
Updation or enhancement in existing modules
Implementation of continuous integration Payment Gateway platform like sabpaisa, paytm, POS Machine, Biometric Machine.
Developed some websites using PHP, Xampp and MYSQL

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelancer
Description: Creation of platforms with Xampp, PHP, MYSQL, HTML, CSS

OtherProjects.Title: Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: My First Website
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: When I was in 10th grade, I created my very first website that ran on localhost only for my practical.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hotel Management
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: I create a project on hotel management in C++ during my 12th, which is capable of checking room availability, check-in, check-out, payment (only for tracking).

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Ludo
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: I developed a Ludo game with C-graphics after 12th. First, I learned C-graphics from sketching a Taj Mahal portrait online. Then, I used my skills and graphics to develop a Ludo game.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Bank Web Application
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: I took a full-stack course during my final semester of college. We learned cross-platform programming using Java as a server, Apache Tomcat as a server, MySQL as a database, and HTML, CSS, and Javascript as frontend technology.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: E- Commerce Web Application
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: I learned and developed E-Commerce applications using frameworks like Spring Boot and Angular from Udemy. Where I integrate payment gateway for online payment and third-party login panel.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Bank Microservice Application
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Currently, I am learning Spring boot microservices from udemy.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
